title: Cannot comment on Yorik Update
body: Pretty straightforward. I try to post my comment and it says "So Sad... You are not authorized." No explanation whatsoever, which is more than a little frustrating. I was going to ask some questions in the hopes the community or Rioter might be able to answer.

replies.body: When you go to the news page, are you still connected to your NA account on the top right?  It may either be that or your account needed to sync, which would happen after posting here.  If you're still experiencing this, try relogging as well as [clearing your cache](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752694-Clearing-Browser-History-and-Cookies).  Hope that helps!

Trying to post a comment here is even giving me trouble.
(Edit: re-logging worked here. Will test in Yorik update.)

This is also a test comment. 

I am having the exact same issue, but I can't even expand the rest of the comments. I get the same Amumu-message when I click on the "More comments" tab. I have checked, I am connected to my NA account (heck, I clicked the "log in" button while I was on that page) and my cache was recently cleared.

On that note, I will check the Champion Update page again after this and try re-logging if it still is not working. But I mostly wanted to let it be known that this is not an isolated incident.
(Edit: re-logging works.)

I am still connected on NA, and I tried commenting even after making this post. I'll try again later with what you suggested.


Right now it's time to jump on the rift.
This is a test comment to see if I can comment here.
